TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void OutlookBarShortcutsEvents_BeforeShortcutRemoveEventHandler(OutlookBarShortcut Shortcut, out bool Cancel);
.class public auto ansi sealed OutlookBarShortcutsEvents_BeforeShortcutRemoveEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub OutlookBarShortcutsEvents_BeforeShortcutRemoveEventHandler(Shortcut As OutlookBarShortcut, ByRef Cancel As Boolean)
public delegate void OutlookBarShortcutsEvents_BeforeShortcutRemoveEventHandler(OutlookBarShortcut ^ Shortcut, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % Cancel);

Docs.param: The OutlookBarShortcut that is being removed.
False when the event occurs. If the event procedure sets this argument to True, the shortcut is not removed from the group.
Docs.summary: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.
